ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound fresh broccoli, cut into spears
1 ½ cups cubed cooked chicken or turkey
1 (10.75 ounce) can Campbell's® Condensed Broccoli Cheese Soup or Campbell's® Condensed 98% Fat Free Broccoli Cheese Soup*

cookingTips: Blanch broccoli briefly before assembling to ensure it cooks evenly during baking
Stir soup and milk together smoothly before combining with other ingredients
Top with toasted bread crumbs just before baking for maximum crunch
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Should I precook the broccoli, and if so, how much so it's not overcooked by the time the casserole is done?
